name: Liftboy (Trynda)
description:
(Jam Entry for the Jammin Jam -> https://itch.io/jam/the-jammin-jam)

You are a Liftboy in a high society Steampunk mall. Make sure your passengers arrive at their destination and be sure to stay polite!

Credits

"Liftboy" created by Benjamin Gneist and Fabian Schroth

Character Avatars taken from the "Steampunk Anime Avatars" Pack made by REXARD
Gear Icon taken from the "GUI Icons" Pack made by REXARD
Banner Badge & Page Background taken from the "GUI Megapack" made by REXARD
Button Design taken from the "GUI Parts" Package made by PONETI
Font "Victorian Parlor" taken from dafont.com -> https://www.dafont.com/de/victorian-parlor.font

Additional Art created by Valeria Bregovec
Elevator SFX provided by Rene Tiedemann
